definition: to descend; causatively, to bring away, deposit, depose
kjvTranslation: carry, come down, depose, lay up, place.

translations.bg: да се спускам; в каузативен смисъл - да отнемам, да депонирам, да свалям
translations.da: at stige ned; kausativt, at bringe væk, deponere, afsætte
translations.el: να κατεβαίνω- αιτιωδώς, να απομακρύνω, να καταθέτω, να αποθέτω
translations.et: laskuda; põhjuslikult, ära viia, hoiustada, deponeerida
translations.fi: laskeutua; kausatiivisesti, tuoda pois, tallettaa, jättää pois
translations.hu: leereszkedni; ok-okozati értelemben: elvinni, lerakni, letenni, letétbe helyezni
translations.id: turun; secara kausal, membawa pergi, menyimpan, menggulingkan
translations.it: scendere; causalmente, portare via, depositare, deporre
translations.ja: を降ろす；因果的に、持ち去る、預ける、退去させる
translations.ko: 하강하다; 원인 적으로, 가져 오다, 예금, 퇴거하다
translations.lt: nusileisti; priežastiniu ryšiu - išnešti, deponuoti, nuimti
translations.nb: å stige ned; kausativt, å føre bort, deponere, avsette
translations.pt: descer; causativamente, levar embora, depositar, depor
translations.ro: a coborî; cauzal, a îndepărta, a depozita, a depune
translations.sl: spustiti se; vzročno odnesti, odložiti, odstraniti
translations.sv: att stiga ner; kausativt, att föra bort, deponera, deponera
translations.tr: inmek; nedensel olarak, götürmek, yatırmak, tahttan indirmek
translations.zh: 下降；因果关系上，带走、存放、贬黜
